Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Calprest®NG quantitative ELISA kit for detection of fecal calprotectin to aid in diagnosis of IBD and differentiate from IBS.
Indications for Use Summary: Quantitative ELISA for detecting concentration of fecal calprotectin to aid in diagnosis of Inflammatory Bowel Diseases (IBD), specifically Crohn’s disease and ulcerative colitis, and to differentiate IBD from Irritable Bowel Syndrome (IBS) in conjunction with other clinical and laboratory findings.
